mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO AS terminalSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, NOUSE_JISA_CODE AS nouseJisaCode, NOUSE_BRANCH_CODE AS nouseBranchCode, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE AS nouseCornerCode, NOUSE_TERMINAL_NO AS nouseTerminalNo, NOUSE_TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS nouseTerminalCorpCode, NOUSE_MODEL_CODE AS nouseModelCode, NOUSE_HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE AS nouseHireTerminalEnable, NOUSE_GUBUN AS nouseGubun, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME AS workPlanDatetime, NEW_BRANCH_CODE AS newBranchCode, NEW_CORNER_CODE AS newCornerCode, NEW_TERMINAL_NO AS newTerminalNo, NEW_TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS newTerminalCorpCode, NEW_MODEL_CODE AS newModelCode, NEW_HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE AS newHireTerminalEnable, NEW_INSTALL_TERMINAL_GUBUN AS newInstallTerminalGubun, NEW_TERMINAL_HIRE_FEE AS newTerminalHireFee, NEW_GATEWAY_IP_ADDR AS newGatewayIpAddr, NEW_TERMINAL_IP_ADDR AS newTerminalIpAddr, NEW_TERMINAL_SMASK_ADDR AS newTerminalSmaskAddr, TERMINAL_PROD_NO AS terminalProdNo, NEW_TERMINAL_MNG_GUBUN AS newTerminalMngGubun FROM ATMS_02001210

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO AS terminalSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, NOUSE_JISA_CODE AS nouseJisaCode, NOUSE_BRANCH_CODE AS nouseBranchCode, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE AS nouseCornerCode, NOUSE_TERMINAL_NO AS nouseTerminalNo, NOUSE_TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS nouseTerminalCorpCode, NOUSE_MODEL_CODE AS nouseModelCode, NOUSE_HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE AS nouseHireTerminalEnable, NOUSE_GUBUN AS nouseGubun, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME AS workPlanDatetime, NEW_BRANCH_CODE AS newBranchCode, NEW_CORNER_CODE AS newCornerCode, NEW_TERMINAL_NO AS newTerminalNo, NEW_TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS newTerminalCorpCode, NEW_MODEL_CODE AS newModelCode, NEW_HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE AS newHireTerminalEnable, NEW_INSTALL_TERMINAL_GUBUN AS newInstallTerminalGubun, NEW_TERMINAL_HIRE_FEE AS newTerminalHireFee, NEW_GATEWAY_IP_ADDR AS newGatewayIpAddr, NEW_TERMINAL_IP_ADDR AS newTerminalIpAddr, NEW_TERMINAL_SMASK_ADDR AS newTerminalSmaskAddr, TERMINAL_PROD_NO AS terminalProdNo, NEW_TERMINAL_MNG_GUBUN AS newTerminalMngGubun FROM ATMS_02001210 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001210 SET TERMINAL_SEQ_NO = #{terminalSeqNo}, CHANGE_CHASU = #{changeChasu}, STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, NOUSE_JISA_CODE = #{nouseJisaCode}, NOUSE_BRANCH_CODE = #{nouseBranchCode}, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE = #{nouseCornerCode}, NOUSE_TERMINAL_NO = #{nouseTerminalNo}, NOUSE_TERMINAL_CORP_CODE = #{nouseTerminalCorpCode}, NOUSE_MODEL_CODE = #{nouseModelCode}, NOUSE_HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE = #{nouseHireTerminalEnable}, NOUSE_GUBUN = #{nouseGubun}, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME = #{workPlanDatetime}, NEW_BRANCH_CODE = #{newBranchCode}, NEW_CORNER_CODE = #{newCornerCode}, NEW_TERMINAL_NO = #{newTerminalNo}, NEW_TERMINAL_CORP_CODE = #{newTerminalCorpCode}, NEW_MODEL_CODE = #{newModelCode}, NEW_HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE = #{newHireTerminalEnable}, NEW_INSTALL_TERMINAL_GUBUN = #{newInstallTerminalGubun}, NEW_TERMINAL_HIRE_FEE = #{newTerminalHireFee}, NEW_GATEWAY_IP_ADDR = #{newGatewayIpAddr}, NEW_TERMINAL_IP_ADDR = #{newTerminalIpAddr}, NEW_TERMINAL_SMASK_ADDR = #{newTerminalSmaskAddr}, TERMINAL_PROD_NO = #{terminalProdNo}, NEW_TERMINAL_MNG_GUBUN = #{newTerminalMngGubun} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001210 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO, CHANGE_CHASU, STEXT_GUBUN, NOUSE_JISA_CODE, NOUSE_BRANCH_CODE, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE, NOUSE_TERMINAL_NO, NOUSE_TERMINAL_CORP_CODE, NOUSE_MODEL_CODE, NOUSE_HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE, NOUSE_GUBUN, WORK_PLAN_DATETIME, NEW_BRANCH_CODE, NEW_CORNER_CODE, NEW_TERMINAL_NO, NEW_TERMINAL_CORP_CODE, NEW_MODEL_CODE, NEW_HIRE_TERMINAL_ENABLE, NEW_INSTALL_TERMINAL_GUBUN, NEW_TERMINAL_HIRE_FEE, NEW_GATEWAY_IP_ADDR, NEW_TERMINAL_IP_ADDR, NEW_TERMINAL_SMASK_ADDR, TERMINAL_PROD_NO, NEW_TERMINAL_MNG_GUBUN ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{terminalSeqNo}, #{changeChasu}, #{stextGubun}, #{nouseJisaCode}, #{nouseBranchCode}, #{nouseCornerCode}, #{nouseTerminalNo}, #{nouseTerminalCorpCode}, #{nouseModelCode}, #{nouseHireTerminalEnable}, #{nouseGubun}, #{workPlanDatetime}, #{newBranchCode}, #{newCornerCode}, #{newTerminalNo}, #{newTerminalCorpCode}, #{newModelCode}, #{newHireTerminalEnable}, #{newInstallTerminalGubun}, #{newTerminalHireFee}, #{newGatewayIpAddr}, #{newTerminalIpAddr}, #{newTerminalSmaskAddr}, #{terminalProdNo}, #{newTerminalMngGubun} )
